thread.title: BRIEF-Touchstone says NPV Of Future Net Revenues Before Tax Was $407.9 mln at ‍Dec 31, 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Touchstone says NPV Of Future Net Revenues Before Tax Was $407.9 mln at ‍Dec 31, 2017
text: March 8, 2018 / 7:41 AM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Touchstone says NPV Of Future Net Revenues Before Tax Was $407.9 mln at ‍Dec 31, 2017 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 8 (Reuters) - Touchstone Exploration Inc: * TOUCHSTONE EXPLORATION - CO’S ‍DECEMBER 31, 2017 NET PRESENT VALUE OF FUTURE NET REVENUES BEFORE TAX (DISCOUNTED AT 10 PERCENT) WAS $407.9 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
